Package com.example.cms.Camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
com.example.cms.Camp.Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Camp class is to represent a camp. Includes information on the camp and methods to get and modify camp info

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp()
      Creates a new Camp without setting any specific info/data

    • Camp

      public Camp(String campName, ArrayList<LocalDate> campDate, LocalDate regCloseDate, ArrayList<Faculty> userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int remainingSlots, int committeeSlots, int remainingCommitteeSlots, String staff, boolean visibility)
      Creates a new Camp with all the specified info
      Parameters:
      campName - Name of camp
      campDate - Dates for which the camp take place
      regCloseDate - Registration closing date of camp
      userGroup - Schools for which students can join the camp
      location - Location of camp
      totalSlots - Total number of attendees that can participate in the camp
      staff - Staff-in-charge of the camp
      visibility - Camp visibility to students

    • getUserGroup

      public ArrayList<Faculty> getUserGroup()
      User group that the camp belongs to. Can be either own school, or whole University. If whole university, it is represented as an ArrayList of ALL schools.
      Returns:
      Schools that the camp involves

      public String getStaffInCharge()

    • getAttendeesRegistered

      Returns:
      all the attendees registered for the camp

    • setAttendeesRegistered

      public void setAttendeesRegistered(Attendee attendee)

      Parameters:
      attendee - New attendee

    • getCommitteeRegistered

      Parameters:
      committeeMember - New committee member

    • getVisibility

      public boolean getVisibility()
      Get visibility of camp. If FALSE, visibility is toggled off, meaning students cannot see it. Controlled by staff-in-charge of the camp.
      Returns:
      Visibility of camp

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(boolean visibility)
      Sets visibility of camp, to either on or off (true or false)
      Parameters:
      visibility - Desired visibility to set

    • getEnquiry

      public ArrayList<Enquiry> getEnquiry()
      Gets list of enquiries for a camp. Note that Enquiries can only be made by Camp attendees.
      Returns:
      list of all enquiries for a camp

    • setEnquiry

      public void setEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds new enquiry to existing list of enquiries for a camp. Note that Enquiries can only be made by Camp attendees.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - New enquiry

    • getSuggestion

      public ArrayList<Suggestion> getSuggestion()
      Gets list of suggestions for a camp. Note that Suggestions can only be made by Camp committee members.
      Returns:
      List of all suggestions for a camp.

    • setSuggestion

      public void setSuggestion(ArrayList<Suggestion> suggestion)
      Sets ArrayList of suggestions based on data from CSV (TO BE CONFIRMED).
      Parameters:
      suggestion - ArrayList of suggestions provided

    • getCampByName

      public static Camp getCampByName(String campName)
      Gets specified Camp object based on user input of name of camp into the hashmap
      Parameters:
      campName - Name of camp specified by user input
      Returns:
      specified Camp object based on user input of name of camp

    • getCampMap

      public static Map<String,Camp> getCampMap()
      Get hashmap containing names matched with corresponding camp objects
      Returns:
      hashmap containing names matched with corresponding camp objects

    • generateCampInfo

      public static void generateCampInfo(StringBuilder campContent, Camp camp)
      Takes all the relevant information on a camp, combines them into a type of string that is readable like a CSV
      Parameters:
      campContent - Mutable string containing all relevant information on the camp, assembled by concatenation
      camp - The specific camp provided
